roleset.name: to make grumbling sounds, utterances
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry grumble.01, which maps to VN 37.3, 37.8. No FN entry for the noun.

example.name: All args
example.text: She walked over to the bench, ignoring his grumble to himself that there definitely would be a 'later'.
example.arg: that there definitely would be a 'later'.
